title: Should I get the COVID-19 vaccine?
description: Getting the COVID-19 vaccine can help protect you and everyone around you from getting sick from COVID-19.
cleaned_text: If you have reached this screen, your current device or browser is unable to access the full Edward-Elmhurst Health Web site.
